ProductInfo.Features:
Processor - Intel i5 1200 MHz || Memory Installed - 4096mb DDR3 > Upgradeable to 8192MB
Hard Drive - 160Gig Serial ATA || Optical Drive - NO OPTICAL DRIVE || Screen Size - LCD
Internet Connection(s) - The installed 802 11 ABGN WI-FI card will allow you to connect to any available wireless network, and the internal Ethernet port will allow a high speed wired connection
Software Installed - NEW Windows 7 Professional 32 Bit, word document & spreadsheet applications, shortcut to Microsofts free virus protection along with a restore partition on the hard drive for easy reinstallation. All software is Genuine!!
What's in the Box? - Panasonic ToughBook CF-19 with NEW pre-installed software, power cord, software registration instructions and a 60 day Warranty
